Endorsed by Mark Merkow, CISSP, CISM, CSSLP (mutual connection)
summary: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AND SECURITY COMPLIANCE PROFESSIONAL with 16 years of international success in implementing strategic-level IT plans including network migration, security consulting, SOX compliance implementations, IT Governance, Payment Card Industry Compliance, Privacy Law compliance (International and US privacy laws), Code of Conduct, Anti-Corruption programs, business process automation and compliance framework integration (ISO 27001/27002), and Third-Party Compliance risk assessments. Highlights include: •	Security Consulting/IT Auditing:  Significantly improved information security and protected the IT assets of clients from unauthorized web-site access by creating information security and incident response team, conducting security audits and creating security policies and procedures based on security best practices.  Help companies achieve SSAE 16 certifications for SOC 2 audits.•	Information Technology Strategy:  Strategically aligned the IT infrastructure, internal controls and the business strategy of public corporations by balancing IT security requirements with the organizations risk appetite.  Use this control alignment to meet the specific security requirements of SOX 404, Privacy laws, HIPAA requirements, and the Payment Card Industry (PCI). •	Leadership: Conducted SOX 404 assessments and remediation for large, public Fortune 100+ organizations to ensure compliance with internal control objectives for financial reporting. Successfully managed large scale IT Security budgets and project teams (15 + members) for various customers and public corporations. Created Enterprise Risk Monitoring programs to ensure mitigation for privacy, security, business continuity, and data protection risks. Certifications:Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) 4/05Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA) 10/05Certified Information Security Manager (CISM) 2/06Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC) 8/10
name: Jeramy Cooper-Leavitt
title: IT Security and Compliance Leader
